price: De ki: İçinizdekini gizleseniz de açıklasanız da onu Allah bilir. Göklerde ve yerde olan her şeyi bilir. Allah’ın her şeye de gücü yeter.
arabic: قُلۡ إِن تُخۡفُواْ مَا فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُبۡدُوهُ يَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul in tukh'fū mā fī ṣudūrikum aw tub'dūhu yaʿlamhu al-lahu wayaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
